snippet.title: Die in the Dungeon (DitD Team) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2026820/Die_in_the_Dungeon/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------
